item.title: Celebrating Aleksandr Lyapunov
item.description: Happy 164th birthday, Aleksandr Lyapunov! I recently participated in the first annual Manim math animation engine hackathon! The theme was aniversaries, so I created the above animation to celebrate the 164th anniversary of mathematician Aleksandr Lyapunov’s birth. This extended some ideas I presented from Steven Strogatz’s nonlinear dynamics textbook at the University of Minnesota’s math directed reading program symposium.
